header.title: Image Directory Generator
header.abstract: This document describes the Image Directory Generator of Cocoon.

s1.title: Image Directory Generator
s1.p: Generates an XML directory listing. This is an extension of the Directory Generator.

The Image Directory provides all the functionality of the Directory Generator. Additionally it ensures that the files are images and adds their dimensions (width and height) to the attributes. It is configured in the same way as the Directory Generator.
